page.title: 06The Stable
page.content: Brailsford stables has been owned by Mr and Mrs Molloy for eight years. They have nineteen horses,which they clean out every day.They have a very rare coach called the ROYAL UMPIRE MAIL COACH.In the stables there is a full time helper and a part time helper.These are the horses names: Memory,Aztec,Shula,Delight,Harmony, Lucinda,Victoria,Sarnau,Black-Magic, Scooby,Evita,Shar,Sunny,Talisman, Odin,Shannon,Santa and Cherry.Memory and Aztec are the youngest horses. Cherry is the oldest he is twentytwo. Nine horses go out on each ride.These are the different kinds of breeds: Knabstruck,Arab,palamino,Welsh-Cob, Cleveland-Bay and Irish Draft.
